Package me.dessie.dessielib.resourcepack.assets

Class ItemAsset

java.lang.Object
me.dessie.dessielib.resourcepack.assets.Asset
me.dessie.dessielib.resourcepack.assets.ItemAsset
public class ItemAsset extends Asset
Creates a model and texture for an ItemStack with a specific model ID attached to it.

  • Constructor Details

    • ItemAsset

      public ItemAsset(String name, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, TextureAsset texture)
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the asset.
      item - The ItemStack to apply the texture to.
      texture - The texture png that will be applied to the ItemStack.

    • ItemAsset

      public ItemAsset(String name, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, @Nullable File modelJson, TextureAsset... textures)
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the asset.
      modelJson - A default model.json that applies to this ItemStack. Can be used if you're creating a 3D model. Can also be null if the texture should be applied without a model.
      item - The ItemStack to apply the texture to.
      textures - The texture pngs that should be applied to the ItemStack on the model. You should key the texture assets according to the texture references inside your model json.

  • Method Details

    • setCustomModelId

      public void setCustomModelId(int customModelId)
      Sets the custom model id of the ItemStack and asset. If an ItemStack matches with the same material and model ID are in-game, this asset will be used.
      Parameters:
      customModelId - The new model ID.

    • getCustomModelId

      public int getCustomModelId()
      Returns:
      The current model ID this asset is using.

    • getTextures

      public List<TextureAsset> getTextures()
      Returns:
      The texture file

    • getItem

      public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getItem()
      Returns a copy of the ItemStack this asset references. When giving your custom items to a Player, this method should be used to guarantee the model is applied properly.
      Returns:
      A copy of the ItemStack that is used.

    • getModel

      public File getModel()
      Returns:
      The model json.

    • getMinecraftItemModelFolder

      public File getMinecraftItemModelFolder()
      Returns:
      The folder that contains the minecraft item model resources. Resolves to serverDir/plugins/pluginName/assets/minecraft/models/item

    • getResourceItemModelFolder

      public File getResourceItemModelFolder()
      Returns:
      The folder that contains the namespaced item model resources. Resolves to serverDir/plugins/pluginName/assets/pluginName/models/item

    • getResourceItemTextureFolder

      public File getResourceItemTextureFolder()
      Returns:
      The folder that contains the namespaced item texture resources. Resolves to serverDir/plugins/pluginName/assets/pluginName/textures/item
